titles.title: United States-India Interparliamentary Exchange Act of 2007
To establish a United States-India interparliamentary exchange group.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
10/2/2007--Introduced.
United States-India Interparliamentary Exchange Act of 2007 - Establishes the United States-India Interparliamentary Exchange Group.
